extendedInfo.description: "Making It Happen TV" hosted by Victoria Lee is The Entertainment Talk Show of the Midwest and Beyond. The purpose of the show is to inspire and encourage others to pursue their own talents. Professional guests from across the United States include: actors, singers, songwriters, musicians, comedians, authors artists and others with performance or non-performing genres.There is an inspirational tone to the show. We're here to lift you up. We focus on clean family entertainment and issues that will hopefully bring resolution and enlightenment to everyday life occurrences. Talents are meant to be shared with the world, so "Don't Just Think It, Make It Happen!"In order to bring you free content we utilize advertising. We collect general information via an OPTIONAL in-app survey in order to provide ads that may be more relevant to you. Your privacy is an important priority at Blue Wave Media. This data is stored anonymously and cannot be linked back to your specific device.

reviews.title: Nice production
reviews.comment: I really enjoy this show. Thank you.
reviews.author: Karl F
